name: Cam Site Builder
author: www.modelnet.club

sections.description:
Cam Site Builder plugin allows you creating webcam site based on WordPress engine.
* You receive all models from Modelnet to your site
* You could earn money from the paid chats and tips from the brought customers
* It is easy to setup and doesn’t require to install streaming server
* Supports Cam Site Builder theme

Arbitrary section

A brief Markdown Example

Thank you
sections.installation:
1. Download and install plugin
  2. Activate the plugin at WordPress Admin Panel -> Plugins
  3. Follow instruction provided on the plugin menu
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Download and install plugin
  2. Activate the plugin at WordPress Admin Panel -> Plugins
  3. Follow instruction provided on the plugin menu

short_description: With Cam Site Builder plugin you can easily add live webcams section into your website.
